00016 package pl.mg6.android.maps.extensions.utils;
00017 
00018 import java.util.Arrays;
00019 
00020 import com.google.android.gms.maps.model.LatLng;
00021 import com.google.android.gms.maps.model.LatLngBounds;
00022 
00023 public final class LatLngBoundsUtils {
00024 
00025         private LatLngBoundsUtils() {
00026         }
00027 
00028         public static LatLngBounds fromCenterAndPositions(LatLng center, Iterable<LatLng> positions) {
00029                 LatLngBounds.Builder builder = LatLngBounds.builder();
00030                 builder.include(center);
00031                 for (LatLng position : positions) {
00032                         LatLng other = new LatLng(2 * center.latitude - position.latitude, 2 * center.longitude - position.longitude);
00033                         builder.include(position);
00034                         builder.include(other);
00035                 }
00036                 return builder.build();
00037         }
00038 
00039         public static LatLngBounds fromCenterAndPositions(LatLng center, LatLng... positions) {
00040                 return fromCenterAndPositions(center, Arrays.asList(positions));
00041         }
00042 }
